title: Insights into the defect-driven heterogeneous structural evolution of Ni-rich layered cathode in lithium-ion batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01777C, Paper
Zhongyuan Huang, Ziwei Chen, Maolin Yang, Mihai Chu, Zenan Li, Sihao Deng, Lunhua He, Lei Jin, Rafal E. Dunin-Borkowski, Rui Wang, Jun Wang, Tingting Yang, Yinguo Xiao
Recently, considerable efforts have been made on research and improvement for Ni-rich lithium-ion batteries to meet the demand from vehicles and grid-level large-scale energy storage. Development of next-generation high-performance lithium-ion...
